mapper.sql: resource_config_id, config_num, strategy, resource_pool_id, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.select:
select
from resource_config order by config_num asc
select skill_item_id from resource_config_skill where resource_config_id = #{resourceConfigId} and status = 1
select skill_item_id from resource_config_skill where status = 1
SELECT c.customer_id FROM resource_config_ex_cust rc INNER JOIN customer c ON c.app_id = rc.app_id WHERE rc.resource_config_id = #{resourceConfigId}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT bss.customer_id FROM `bigv_skill_score` bss INNER JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = bss.customer_id AND c.cust_state = 2 AND c.cust_status = 1 AND c.v_status = 2 INNER JOIN skill_item si ON si.id = bss.skill_item_id AND si.skill_status = 1 INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND csk.skill_status = 1 AND csk.switch_status = 1 AND csk.receive_status = 1
WHERE bss.skill_item_id IN
#{configSkill}
and bss.customer_id NOT IN
#{customerId}
AND (SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = bss.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28)) = 0
GROUP BY bss.customer_id ) tt

SELECT tt.*, csc.skill_voice_url AS skillVoiceUrl, csc.skill_voice_time AS skillVoiceTime FROM ( SELECT bss.customer_id AS customerId, bss.customer_skill_id AS customerSkillId, bss.skill_item_id AS skillItemId, c.nick_name AS customerNickName, c.sex AS customerSex, c.birthday AS customerBirthday, si.skill_item_name AS skillName, si.back_color AS skillBackColor, si.home_black_color AS skillHomeBackColor, si.font_color AS skillFontColor, csk.discount_price AS discountPrice, csk.service_unit AS serviceUnit, csk.certify_id FROM `bigv_skill_score` bss INNER JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = bss.customer_id AND c.cust_state = 2 AND c.cust_status = 1 AND c.v_status = 2 INNER JOIN skill_item si ON si.id = bss.skill_item_id AND si.skill_status = 1 INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND csk.skill_status = 1 AND csk.switch_status = 1 AND csk.receive_status = 1
WHERE bss.skill_item_id IN
#{configSkill}
and bss.customer_id NOT IN
#{customerId}
AND (SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = bss.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28)) = 0
GROUP BY bss.customer_id ORDER BY sum(bss.score_total) DESC LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{endIndex} ) tt LEFT JOIN customer_skill_certify csc ON csc.certify_id = tt.certify_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1

SELECT bss.customer_id AS customerId, bss.customer_skill_id AS customerSkillId, bss.skill_item_id AS skillItemId, c.nick_name AS customerNickName, c.sex AS customerSex, c.birthday AS customerBirthday, si.skill_item_name AS skillName, si.back_color AS skillBackColor, si.home_black_color AS skillHomeBackColor, si.font_color AS skillFontColor, csk.discount_price AS discountPrice, csk.service_unit AS serviceUnit, csc.skill_voice_url AS skillVoiceUrl, csc.skill_voice_time AS skillVoiceTime FROM bigv_skill_score bss INNER JOIN customer c ON c.customer_id = bss.customer_id AND c.cust_state = 2 AND c.cust_status = 1 AND c.v_status = 2 INNER JOIN skill_item si ON si.id = bss.skill_item_id AND si.skill_status = 1 INNER JOIN customer_skill csk ON csk.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND csk.skill_status = 1
LEFT JOIN customer_skill_certify csc ON csc.certify_id = csk.certify_id WHERE bss.skill_item_id = #{skillItemId} ORDER BY (SELECT count(o.order_id) FROM orders o WHERE o.customer_skill_id = bss.customer_skill_id AND o.skill_type = (select si.skill_type from skill_item si where si.id = bss.skill_item_id) AND o.order_status IN (10, 18, 26, 28)) ASC , bss.score_total DESC LIMIT 0, 4
